segments.text: As I observe the scene, I can’t help but feel anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is so focused on her task, and the mess is escalating.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the water pooling under her feet; it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Then I turn my gaze to the boy on the stool, and my stomach drops.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He looks so determined to reach that cookie jar, but at what cost?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him looks impatient, her arm reaching up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What an innocent expression on her face; she's so unaware of the risks.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can feel my heart race; I want to yell for them to stop.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I know it would ruin the moment, and maybe that’s what they’re after.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Still, I can’t shake this feeling of impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR
